title: Alfonso Morales
text: Alfonso Morales (born May 19, 1937) is an American <a href="fencing">fencer</a>. He competed in the individual and team <a href="sabre%20%28fencing%29">sabre</a> events at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960</a>, <a href="1964%20Summer%20Olympics">1964</a>, <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968</a> and <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
